summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3911 for the improvement of East 55th Street, from Latona Avenue to 10th Avenue Northeast, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47633 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
